amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to insert a complete new text entitled "Ensuring Student Choice and Competition Act of 2009".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in House Report 111-256 to extend the ECASLA programs through 2014 and create a commission to develop a new private sector model for student lending.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Guthrie amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 265 (Roll no. 717).

action.text: Amendment (A023) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Guthrie.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Guthrie.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Guthrie amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 265 (Roll no. 717).
